description: This source file contains utility functions related to DHCP server management for network interfaces, including system command execution, interface property retrieval, and process management functions.

methods.name: int vsystem(const char * fmt,...)
methods.description: Executes a formatted system command and logs it.

methods.name: int sysctl_iface_set(const char * path,const char * ifname,const char * content)
methods.description: Sets a sysctl parameter by writing directly into the /proc/sys/ filesystem.

methods.name: int iface_get_hwaddr(const char * ifname,char * mac,size_t size)
methods.description: Retrieves the hardware (MAC) address of a specified network interface.

methods.name: int iface_get_ipv4addr(const char * ifname,char * ipv4Addr,size_t size)
methods.description: Retrieves the IPv4 address assigned to a specified network interface.

methods.name: int is_iface_present(const char * ifname)
methods.description: Checks if a specified network interface is present on the system.

methods.name: int pid_of(const char * name,const char * keyword)
methods.description: Finds the process ID of a process with a given name and optional keyword in its command line.

methods.name: int serv_can_start(int sefd,token_t setok,const char * servname)
methods.description: Determines whether a specified service can be started based on its current status.

methods.name: int serv_can_stop(int sefd,token_t setok,const char * servname)
methods.description: Determines whether a specified service can be stopped based on its current status.
